00021 #ifndef OPENRAVE_TRAJECTORY_H
00022 #define OPENRAVE_TRAJECTORY_H
00023 
00024 namespace OpenRAVE {
00025 
00029 class OPENRAVE_API TrajectoryBase : public InterfaceBase
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     TrajectoryBase(EnvironmentBasePtr penv);
00033     virtual ~TrajectoryBase() {
00034     }
00035 
00037     static inline InterfaceType GetInterfaceTypeStatic() {
00038         return PT_Trajectory;
00039     }
00040 
00041     virtual void Init(const ConfigurationSpecification& spec) = 0;
00042 
00049     virtual void Insert(size_t index, const std::vector<dReal>& data, bool bOverwrite=false) = 0;
00050 
00058     virtual void Insert(size_t index, const std::vector<dReal>& data, const ConfigurationSpecification& spec, bool bOverwrite=false) = 0;
00059 
00061     virtual void Remove(size_t startindex, size_t endindex) = 0;
00062 
00068     virtual void Sample(std::vector<dReal>& data, dReal time) const = 0;
00069 
00077     virtual void Sample(std::vector<dReal>& data, dReal time, const ConfigurationSpecification& spec) const;
00078 
00079     virtual const ConfigurationSpecification& GetConfigurationSpecification() const = 0;
00080 
00082     virtual size_t GetNumWaypoints() const = 0;
00083 
00090     virtual void GetWaypoints(size_t startindex, size_t endindex, std::vector<dReal>& data) const = 0;
00091 
00100     virtual void GetWaypoints(size_t startindex, size_t endindex, std::vector<dReal>& data, const ConfigurationSpecification& spec) const;
00101 
00107     inline void GetWaypoint(int index, std::vector<dReal>& data) const
00108     {
00109         int numpoints = GetNumWaypoints();
00110         BOOST_ASSERT(index >= -numpoints && index < numpoints);
00111         if( index < 0 ) {
00112             index += numpoints;
00113         }
00114         GetWaypoints(index,index+1,data);
00115     }
00116 
00122     inline void GetWaypoint(int index, std::vector<dReal>& data, const ConfigurationSpecification& spec) const
00123     {
00124         int numpoints = GetNumWaypoints();
00125         BOOST_ASSERT(index >= -numpoints && index < numpoints);
00126         if( index < 0 ) {
00127             index += numpoints;
00128         }
00129         GetWaypoints(index,index+1,data,spec);
00130     }
00131 
00133     virtual dReal GetDuration() const = 0;
00134 
00136     virtual void serialize(std::ostream& O, int options=0) const;
00137 
00139     virtual void deserialize(std::istream& I);
00140 
00141     virtual void Clone(InterfaceBaseConstPtr preference, int cloningoptions);
00142 
00143     // Old Trajectory API
00144 
00146     class Point
00147     {
00148 public:
00149         Point() : time(0) {
00150         }
00151         Point(const std::vector<dReal>& newq, dReal newtime) : time(newtime) {
00152             q = newq;
00153         }
00154         Point(const std::vector<dReal>& newq, const Transform& newtrans, dReal newtime) : time(newtime) {
00155             q=newq;
00156             trans=newtrans;
00157         }
00158         dReal time;
00159         std::vector<dReal> q, qdot, qtorque;
00160         Transform trans;
00161         Vector linearvel, angularvel;
00162     };
00163 
00165     typedef Point TPOINT RAVE_DEPRECATED;
00166 
00168     virtual bool SampleTrajectory(dReal time, Point& tp) const RAVE_DEPRECATED;
00169 
00171     virtual const std::vector<Point>& GetPoints() const RAVE_DEPRECATED;
00172 
00174     inline int GetDOF() const RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00175         return GetConfigurationSpecification().GetDOF();
00176     }
00177 
00179     virtual dReal GetTotalDuration() const RAVE_DEPRECATED
00180     {
00181         return GetDuration();
00182     }
00183 
00185     virtual bool Write(std::ostream& O, int options) const RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00186         serialize(O,options);
00187         return true;
00188     }
00189 
00191     virtual bool Read(std::istream& I, RobotBaseConstPtr) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00192         deserialize(I);
00193         return true;
00194     }
00195 
00197     virtual int GetInterpMethod() const RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00198         return 0;
00199     }
00200 
00202     virtual bool CalcTrajTiming(RobotBasePtr probot, int interp,  bool autocalc, bool activedof, dReal fmaxvelmult=1) RAVE_DEPRECATED;
00203 
00205     virtual void Clear() RAVE_DEPRECATED
00206     {
00207         Remove(0,GetNumWaypoints());
00208     }
00209 
00211     virtual void AddPoint(const Point& p) RAVE_DEPRECATED;
00212 
00214     virtual void Reset(int dof) RAVE_DEPRECATED
00215     {
00216         Remove(0,GetNumWaypoints());
00217     }
00218 
00220     static const int TO_OneLine RAVE_DEPRECATED = 1;
00221     static const int TO_NoHeader RAVE_DEPRECATED = 2;
00222     static const int TO_IncludeTimestamps RAVE_DEPRECATED = 4;
00223     static const int TO_IncludeBaseTransformation RAVE_DEPRECATED = 8;
00224     static const int TO_IncludeVelocities RAVE_DEPRECATED = 0x10;
00225     static const int TO_IncludeTorques RAVE_DEPRECATED = 0x20;
00226     static const int TO_InterpolationMask RAVE_DEPRECATED = 0x1c0;
00227     static const int NONE RAVE_DEPRECATED = 0;
00228     static const int LINEAR RAVE_DEPRECATED = 1;
00229     static const int LINEAR_BLEND RAVE_DEPRECATED = 2;
00230     static const int CUBIC RAVE_DEPRECATED = 3;
00231     static const int QUINTIC RAVE_DEPRECATED = 4;
00232     static const int NUM_METHODS RAVE_DEPRECATED = 5;
00233 
00234 protected:
00235     inline TrajectoryBasePtr shared_trajectory() {
00236         return boost::static_pointer_cast<TrajectoryBase>(shared_from_this());
00237     }
00238     inline TrajectoryBaseConstPtr shared_trajectory_const() const {
00239         return boost::static_pointer_cast<TrajectoryBase const>(shared_from_this());
00240     }
00241 
00242 private:
00243     virtual const char* GetHash() const {
00244         return OPENRAVE_TRAJECTORY_HASH;
00245     }
00246 
00248     mutable std::vector<Point> __vdeprecatedpoints;
00249 };
